properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, FILE_NM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_STATUS,AREA_CATEGORY_CD FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE AREA_CATEGORY_CD = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO =1 AND FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC
SELECT NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, AREA_CATEGORY_CD FROM BOARD WHERE AREA_CATEGORY_CD = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO =? AND ROWNUM <= 7 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, FILE_NM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_STATUS,AREA_CATEGORY_CD FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =1 AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0 ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE_NO =? AND ROWNUM <= 7 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
